snippet: During halftime of a victory over Eastern Michigan, Eric LeGrand became the first player in the 144-year history of Rutgers football to have his jersey retired.
abstract: College Football East Roundup; Rutgers beats Eastern Michigan, 28-10; Eric Le Grand becomes first players in 144-year history of Rutgers to have his jersey retired during halftime; he was paralyzed in 2010 game; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: During halftime of a victory over Eastern Michigan, Eric LeGrand became the first player in the 144-year history of Rutgers football to have his jersey retired.

headline.main: Ex-Player, Hurt in 2010, Is Honored by Rutgers
headline.print_headline: Ex-Player, Hurt in 2010, Is Honored By Rutgers

keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
